mentorshipPrograms.name: Crear Futuros
mentorshipPrograms.description: One on one mentoring for first year and continuing students. Get personalized guidance from experienced mentors.

mentorshipPrograms.name: Impact Peer
mentorshipPrograms.description: Peer mentoring program connecting students with student leaders who understand your journey.

mentorshipPrograms.name: College Discovery
mentorshipPrograms.description: Academic and career mentoring for eligible students with comprehensive support services.
mentorshipPrograms.targetAudience: Eligible students based on income requirements

mentorshipPrograms.name: ASAP Mentoring
mentorshipPrograms.description: Accelerated Study in Associate Programs mentoring for full-time students.

mentorshipPrograms.name: Career Mentorship
mentorshipPrograms.description: Connect with professionals in your field of interest for career guidance and networking.
mentorshipPrograms.targetAudience: All students interested in career development

campusEvents.name: Welcome Week Festival
campusEvents.description: Join us for a week of activities, free food, and meeting new friends!

campusEvents.name: Career Fair 2024
campusEvents.description: Meet employers from top companies. Bring your resume!

campusEvents.name: Club Fair
campusEvents.description: Discover over 50 student clubs and organizations.

campusEvents.name: Study Abroad Info Session
campusEvents.description: Learn about opportunities to study internationally.

scholarships.name: BMCC Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship for students with GPA 3.0 or higher.

scholarships.name: CUNY Student Success Grant
scholarships.description: Need-based grant for students facing financial emergencies.

scholarships.name: STEM Excellence Award
scholarships.description: For students pursuing Science, Technology, Engineering, or Math degrees.

academicSupport.name: Writing Center
academicSupport.description: Free tutoring for all your writing assignments.
academicSupport.services: Essay help, Grammar review, Citation guidance

academicSupport.name: Math Tutoring Lab
academicSupport.description: Drop-in tutoring for all math courses.

academicSupport.name: Library Research Help
academicSupport.description: Get help finding sources for your research papers.
